title: Coal - global proved reserves by type 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Anthracite and bituminous is gradually increasing, Sub-bituminous and lignite is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Reserves in million metric tons, in descending order is: 1. Anthracite and bituminous, and lastly, 2. Sub-bituminous and lignite.
The minimum Reserves in million metric tons about 323117.0, occured at 2016 by Sub-bituminous and lignite.
The greatest difference of Reserves in million metric tons between Anthracite and bituminous and Sub-bituminous and lignite occurs at Year 2016 and the smallest difference occurs at 2014.
